According to the legend, why did Hou Yi shoot down the suns?
items.a: Because ten suns appeared in the sky and burned the earth.

items.q: Why do families gather to celebrate the Mid-Autumn Festival?
items.a: To enjoy the full moon and celebrate family reunion.

items.q: What do lanterns symbolize during the festival?
items.a: They symbolize light, hope, and good fortune.
